import React, { useState, useMemo } from 'react'; import { Eye, Filter, AlertTriangle, Download, Camera, Calendar, TrendingUp, Shield, Search, ChevronRight, MoreHorizontal, X, FileText, CheckCircle2 } from 'lucide-react'; // --- Interfaces --- interface Incident { id: string; weapon_type: string; confidence: number; timestamp: string; date: string; time: string; camera_id: string; camera_name: string; image_url: string; severity: 'critical' | 'high' | 'medium' | 'low'; } const mockIncidents: Incident[] = [ { id: 'INC-001', weapon_type: 'Pistola', confidence: 0.94, timestamp: '2026-02-09 14:32:15', date: '09/02/2026', time: '14:32:15', camera_id: 'CAM-001', camera_name: 'Entrada Principal', image_url: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1557597774-9d273605dfa9?w=800', severity: 'high' }, { id: 'INC-002', weapon_type: 'Rifle', confidence: 0.87, timestamp: '2026-02-09 13:18:42', date: '09/02/2026', time: '13:18:42', camera_id: 'CAM-005', camera_name: 'Estacionamiento Norte', image_url: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1557597774-9d273605dfa9?w=800', severity: 'critical' }, { id: 'INC-003', weapon_type: 'Cuchillo', confidence: 0.76, timestamp: '2026-02-09 12:05:28', date: '09/02/2026', time: '12:05:28', camera_id: 'CAM-012', camera_name: 'Pasillo Norte - Piso 2', image_url: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1557597774-9d273605dfa9?w=800', severity: 'medium' }, { id: 'INC-004', weapon_type: 'Pistola', confidence: 0.91, timestamp: '2026-02-09 11:44:11', date: '09/02/2026', time: '11:44:11', camera_id: 'CAM-003', camera_name: 'Recepción Principal', image_url: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1557597774-9d273605dfa9?w=800', severity: 'high' }, { id: 'INC-005', weapon_type: 'Pistola', confidence: 0.82, timestamp: '2026-02-09 09:15:47', date: '09/02/2026', time: '09:15:47', camera_id: 'CAM-001', camera_name: 'Entrada Principal', image_url: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1557597774-9d273605dfa9?w=800', severity: 'high' }, ]; export const Incidents = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [filterCamera, setFilterCamera] = useState('all'); const [filterSeverity, setFilterSeverity] = useState('all'); const [selectedIncident, setSelectedIncident] = useState(null); // Cálculo de cámaras únicas para el filtro const uniqueCameras = useMemo(() => { const map = new Map(); mockIncidents.forEach(inc => { if (!map.has(inc.camera_id)) map.set(inc.camera_id, inc.camera_name); }); return Array.from(map.entries()); }, []); // Lógica de filtrado const filteredIncidents = useMemo(() => { return mockIncidents.filter(inc => { const matchesSearch = inc.id.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || inc.weapon_type.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()); const matchesCamera = filterCamera === 'all' || inc.camera_id === filterCamera; const matchesSeverity = filterSeverity === 'all' || inc.severity === filterSeverity; return matchesSearch && matchesCamera && matchesSeverity; }); }, [searchTerm, filterCamera, filterSeverity]); const getSeverityStyles = (severity: string) => { switch (severity) { case 'critical': return 'bg-rose-50 text-rose-700 border-rose-200'; case 'high': return 'bg-orange-50 text-orange-700 border-orange-200'; case 'medium': return 'bg-amber-50 text-amber-700 border-amber-200'; default: return 'bg-slate-50 text-slate-700 border-slate-200'; } }; const stats = useMemo(() => ({ total: filteredIncidents.length, critical: filteredIncidents.filter(i => i.severity === 'critical').length, avgConfidence: filteredIncidents.length > 0 ? (filteredIncidents.reduce((acc, curr) => acc + curr.confidence, 0) / filteredIncidents.length * 100).toFixed(0) : '0' }), [filteredIncidents]); return (
{/* 1. Header con acciones principales */}

Registro de Incidentes

Gestión y auditoría de detecciones de seguridad

{/* 2. Grid de Estadísticas */}

Total Hoy

{stats.total}

Críticos

{stats.critical}

IA Estable

{stats.avgConfidence}%

Cámaras

{uniqueCameras.length}

{/* 3. Panel de Filtros */}
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} />
{/* 4. Tabla de Resultados */}
{filteredIncidents.map((incident) => ( ))}
Incidente Detección de Arma Confianza IA Cámara / Origen Nivel Acciones
{incident.id}

{incident.date} · {incident.time}

{incident.weapon_type}
0.9 ? 'bg-emerald-500' : 'bg-blue-500'}`} style={{ width: `${incident.confidence * 100}%` }} />
{(incident.confidence * 100).toFixed(0)}%
{incident.camera_name} {incident.camera_id} {incident.severity}
{filteredIncidents.length === 0 && (

No se encontraron resultados para tu búsqueda

)}
{/* 5. Modal de Detalle (Simulado con overlay) */} {selectedIncident && (

Incidente {selectedIncident.id}

{selectedIncident.timestamp}

Detección

{selectedIncident.weapon_type}

Cámara

{selectedIncident.camera_name}

)}
); }; export default Incidents;z
